Shareholder Name: Khaled Abdallah Abdul Rahman Al Saud
Ahmed Khaled Abdullah Abdul Rahman Al Saud
Khalil bin Abdulfattah Khalil Al Kurdi

Description: Saudi Arabian Amiantit (known as: Amiantit) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since November 1996. Amiantit operates within the Capital Goods sector focusing on Industrial Machinery. It has Companies operating across Southern and Central Asia, Eastern Asia, British Islands, Western Europe, Southern Africa, Northern Africa, Nordic Countries, Eastern Europe, Middle East and Southern Europe. Amiantit is based in Dammam, Saudi Arabia and was established in June 1968.
